name: Build a Better Bank
goal: BUBEBA is an initiative who has the particularity of being run by professionals of the consumer finance and the banking industry. We believe that responsible banking is a basic benefit, an urgent need for society and bankâ€™s survival. We believe that the role of banks are to participate positively to the major societal changes of tomorrow. We want banks, our employers to be asof now more integrated into their community, to be vectors of change, to be more sustainable, to be more respectful and to be more committed.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology
